text: WHO recommends girls aged 9-14 years as primary target population for HPV vaccination in 2-dose schedule at least 6 months apart, ideally to be completed within 12 months and be included in all national immunisation programmes to achieve $90 \%$ vaccination of all girls by age 15 by 2030 (13).
